title: Warring Kingdoms Skins???
body: Hello! When will the Warring Kingdoms Garen skin be available for purchase once again? Thank you.

replies.body: I do believe those were related to the lunar revel last year, so I'd think there's a pretty good chance of them coming back around once the new skins drop. I don't have any concrete yes or no quite yet though, so be sure to check the [**news page for the sales**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales).
